column4: I use vbox too, but when I upgrade to 9.10, I get a problem that is the left ctrl key be auto pressed sometime... I don't know why, do you have the same problem?
- when you say you upgraded to 9.10, is this machine a VM machine or is it your core OS youre running vbox on?
My host is Ubuntu, and guest is windows xp.
- Im not sure. Ubuntu 9.10 introduced enough problems to my PC that I dropped back to 9.04 and intend to stay there. :(
